data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Tawi-Tawi, Philippines.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tawi-Tawi, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Tawi-Tawi.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Tawi-Tawi, Philippines to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 336,363 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Tawi-Tawi, Philippines to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Sama, Southern people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Sama, Southern people.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Tawi-Tawi, Philippines who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Over 9.03 percent of the people of Tawi-Tawi are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.section_summary:
the state of Tawi-Tawi, Philippines has a population of 390,800.

We estimate Tawi-Tawi has 54,438 people who might know Jesus, 301,055 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 35,308 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 54,438 believers in the state of Tawi-Tawi the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

location.name: Tawi-Tawi
location.cities_list: Bongao, Sitangkai, Languyan, New Batu Batu, Tampakan
location.cities_list_w_pop: Bongao (26,518), Sitangkai (17,200), Languyan (8,900), New Batu Batu (8,881), Tampakan (8,306)
